input: As a customer, I want to add items to my shopping cart so that I can purchase multiple products
expected: {"id": "US_002", "user_story": "As a customer, I want to add items to my shopping cart so that I can purchase multiple products", "quality_score": 0.88, "test_cases": [{"id": "TC_004", "title": "Add single item to empty cart", "priority": "high", "preconditions": "User is viewing a product page AND cart is empty", "steps": ["Click 'Add to Cart' button"], "expected_result": "Item is added to cart AND cart count shows 1 AND success message appears"}, {"id": "TC_005", "title": "Add multiple quantities of same item", "priority": "high", "preconditions": "User is viewing a product page", "steps": ["Select quantity 3", "Click 'Add to Cart' button"], "expected_result": "Cart shows 3 units of the product AND total price is calculated correctly"}, {"id": "TC_006", "title": "Add item when out of stock", "priority": "high", "preconditions": "Product is marked as out of stock", "steps": ["Attempt to click 'Add to Cart' button"], "expected_result": "'Add to Cart' button is disabled AND message 'Out of Stock' is displayed"}]}
